Quasar:




Quasar looked up at the large bot, Megatron. She took a step back to 
get some distance. The rest of his crew looked hostile.

She nodded lightly to him. "Yes, I suppose so. What's going 
on...commander?"



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, JP3884@a... wrote:
>        Several of the Predacons snapped to attention and drew thier 
wepons on 
> the new, and rather dashing, fembot standing in the doorway of the 
engin 
> room. "An invader!" Inferno cried, making his way closer.
>        Megatron, stepping out from the shadows shoved Inferno to 
the floor 
> and stepped in front of Quasar, "Hello, and you must be Black 
Aracnia's and 
> Quickstrike's offspring, correct? Im Megatron, youre Commander."
> 
>        Aracnia and Gremlin looked on the monitor of a large 
solitary 
> computer. On it was the blueprints of the vessle. Taking her claw, 
Aracnia 
> traced out a path they could take.
>        "This corridor has only three internal autoguns, we can take 
those out 
> in a snap. All we need to do is to get in...here." She said, 
resting her claw 
> on a small room. 
>        Gremlin leaned closer, and then it hit him, what she was 
thinking was 
> a good idea, and a perfect wa to get the drop on the Rebels and 
most 
> importantly to get Quickstrike.
